mapper.select:
select city_name, storeno,store_name, area_no, area_name,employee_a_no, employee_a_name, sum(pesgmv) pesgmv,pubseas,(sum(pesgmv) +pubseas) as totalsum from ds_areatrade where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
and storeno IN (${storeids})
and area_no in (${areano})
group by employee_a_no
mapper.delete: delete from ds_areatrade where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.update: update ds_areatrade set pubseas = #{pubseas} where year =#{year} and month =#{month} and storeno = #{storeno}
